solution_line_template: It took Leo {first_part_minutes} x {second_part_multiplier} = <<{first_part_minutes}*{second_part_multiplier}={second_part_minutes}>>{second_part_minutes} minutes to finish the second part of the assignment.

Leo finished the first and second parts of the assignment in {first_part_minutes} + {second_part_minutes} = <<{first_part_minutes}+{second_part_minutes}={first_two_parts_minutes}>>{first_two_parts_minutes} minutes.
He finished the entire assignment in {minutes_per_hour} x {hours_total} = <<{minutes_per_hour}*{hours_total}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes.

Therefore, it took Leo {total_minutes} - {first_two_parts_minutes} = <<{total_minutes}-{first_two_parts_minutes}={third_part_minutes}>>{third_part_minutes} minutes to finish the third part of the assignment.
